solution_line_template: If the first car was made {diff_first_second} years earlier than the second car, then the manufacture date for the second car is {first_car_year}+{diff_first_second} = {second_car_year}
The third car was manufactured {diff_second_third} years after the second car was made, which is {second_car_year}+{diff_second_third} = {third_car_year}
